title.narrative: PROGRAMME PLANNING AND MONITORING

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

participating-org.narrative: TRUSTEES OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: Effective programme planning and monitoring, both in development and humanitarian context, was ensured through strategic evidence generation, UN coordination thorugh the development of CCA and UNSDCF and cross-sectoral cooperation between all programme sections during the developemnt of the new Country Programme. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/01/2022

Evaluation Reference Group for the Country Programme Evaluation established(62232)

actual.value: 2019:A list of proposed ERG members is developed and discussions with most of proposed members took place during ToR scoping mission. The ERG should formally meet for the first time during the inception mission in Autumn.

title.narrative: Evaluation Reference Group for the Country Programme Evaluation established(62232)

actual.value: 2019:A list of proposed ERG members is developed and discussions with most of proposed members took place during ToR scoping mission. The ERG should formally meet for the first time during the inception mission in Autumn.

title.narrative: Inception mission and inception report of the Country Programme Evaluation completed(62234)

actual.value: 2019:Inception mission was held from 6 to 8 November. The Inception report was submitted and quality assured externally. In addition, the CO and ERG reviewed the report. The final Inception Report will be submitted on January 7, 2020.

title.narrative: Inception mission and inception report of the Country Programme Evaluation completed(62234)
